mapper.insert: INSERT INTO access_log ( request_uri, class_name, class_simple_name, method_name, remote_addr, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{requestUri}, #{className}, #{classSimpleName}, #{methodName}, #{remoteAddr}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT log_no, request_uri, class_name, class_simple_name, method_name, remote_addr, reg_date, upd_date FROM access_log ORDER BY log_no DESC
